doc.title: Mummy Autopsy
doc.plot: Mummy Autopsy is a new series that uses forensic science and the latest investigative techniques to unlock the human stories of mummies around the world, examining their deaths - from disease, murder and even ritual sacrifice - and exploring their lives. Each episode features two investigations into the secrets locked within ancient remains, each led by two 'Mummy Investigators' (MIs), whose skills range from forensic osteology and pathology to radiology and bio-archeology. With clear story-telling and serious science explained with the help of dramatic CGI, Mummy Autopsy reveals fascinating insights into the past
